The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS P. DANZIG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ERWIN CHEMERINSKY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS P. DANZIG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
